After some times, Blackfang arrived near where the maximals were 
fighting Megatron. He quickly transformed and looked around for any 
other predacons.

Blackfang: Don't tell me he's all alone? Why would he risk his life 
against the whole bunch of maximals?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> Nightlight followed Blackfang.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > The wolf bot let out a feral howl inside the base. The hunter was 
> > released.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Let's show those preds what we're made of!
> > 
> > He started running and was soon out of the base.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Nightlight::
> > > 
> > > Nightlight smiled kindly and she started to trasform, it took 
her 
> > > some minutes as if her tranformation's system hadn't been used 
in 
> a 
> > > large while (Well it's hadn't used for first time until that 
> > moment). 
> > > Her beast mode was a black panter with Hwak paws in her forward 
> paws 
> > > and wings.  Her eyes, in her beast mode, had blue eyes and she 
> > smiled 
> > > kindly and said "I'm ready... lets go."
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Blackfang nooded and transformed to his wolf mode.
> > > > 
> > > > Blackfang: By the way, if you don't have a beast mode, hop on!
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Nightlight:
> > > > > 
> > > > > "I don't sure"said Nightlight"But I'll do my best"
